p: Although clinical manifestations of COVID-19 children were generally less severe than those of adult patients, young children, particularly infants, were vulnerable to SARS-CoV-2 infection. In children, the respiratory involvement appears to have a more benign course, with almost no fatalities reported in this age group (Dong et al. 2020; Nicastro et al. 2020; Yonker et al. 2020).
